author: Jonathan Stempel
title: JPMorgan directors win end to mortgage oversight lawsuit
text:
JPMorgan Chase & Co directors, including Chief Executive Jamie Dimon, have won the dismissal of a shareholder lawsuit claiming that they concealed problems in the bankâ€™s mortgage business that ultimately resulted in $17.5 billion of settlements with investors and regulators.
In a decision on Monday, U.S. District Judge John Keenan in Manhattan said New York law precluded the plaintiffs from pursuing their state law claims.
